title: Analog Clock AW-7 PRO
summary: original analog and digital watch face for Android Wear
description: Original analog watch face for Android Wear. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date. Application supports 12/24 time format and any language to dispaly month and day of the week.To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.* Left top corner: set font face (there are 5 types);* Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off;* Left bottom color: to change secondary color (there are 15 colors);* Right bottom color: to set gradient or solid style.
descriptionHTML:
Original analog watch face for Android Wear. The watch shows analog and digital clock and the current date.
Application supports 12/24 time format and any language to dispaly month and day of the week.
To control of Watch Face appearence just touch on it.
* Left top corner: set font face (there are 5 types);
* Right top corner: show date and digital clock on/off;
* Left bottom color: to change secondary color (there are 15 colors);
* Right bottom color: to set gradient or solid style.
comments: Not buy it because  not work Long time  to install  but not open better  no buy

Nice to pay real money for an app that won't OPEN. I was having trouble opening the free version of this app, so I figured that I'd probably have much better luck if I just got the Pro version, so I spent the money. Well, I've been waiting LITERALLY for 20+ minutes, and the app STILL won't open. At the start, it tells you to expect a 1 - 3 minute wait for the app to connect, which was fine if it ACTUALLY OPENED within that time-frame, but I'm STILL waiting & NOTHING. I might as well get my money back and wait for the app to open for free. Sorry.
Doesn't open at all in my device.
I pay and not working I want my money back
